name: glibd
description: GlibD is the Digital Mars D programing language OO wrapper for Glib.
preGenerateCommands-posix: cd $PACKAGE_DIR && dub run girtod -- -i src -o generated --use-runtime-linker
preGenerateCommands-windows: cd $PACKAGE_DIR && dub run girtod -- -i src -o generated --use-runtime-linker
